title: Party Popper

nouns: Formal performance of a solemn rite.
The public performance of a sacrament or solemn ceremony with all appropriate ritual
Performance of a ceremony (in an appropriate and solemn manner), such as performing a marriage.
The formal performance of a solemn rite, such as Christian sacrament
The date and year something was born.
The year, month, and day of someone's birth; date of birth
Date and year when something was born.
A birthday is a celebration of the anniversary of a person's birth.
The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called birthdate or date of birth.
The date on which a person was born.
Day that comes once a year when a person celebrates the anniversary of his or her birth
A birthday is an occasion when a person or institution celebrates the anniversary of their birth.
The date on which a person was born
A party popper is an object commonly used at parties.

description:
A party popper, as explodes in a shower of confetti and streamers at a celebration. Generally depicted as a gold party hat, striped on some platforms, at a 45° angle, with multicolored confetti and streamers coming from its opening at the upper right. Twitter’s cone is red.

Like ðŸŽŠ Confetti Ball, commonly used to convey congratulations and celebration, as on New Year’s Eve, birthdays, wedding days, graduations, and other special occasions or good times more generally.
apple_vendor_description: The party popper emoji on Apple devices bursts with vibrant energy, designed to celebrate joyous occasions. A cascade of confetti and streamers erupts from its classic conical shape, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading that makes the colors pop.  Realistic lighting highlights the dynamic motion, evoking a sense of fun and festivity, perfect for marking achievements or special events.
